channel.title: Possible Project
channel.description: Well for a good year now servers have been 99% identical, recently I've seen a project that actually stand out as someone trying to make something unique. It is Cocoa's Nazi Zombies this is a fresh take on the tools provided and with some work its shaping up to be a nice project. Well this got me thinking, why not actually start making unique servers again, servers with a purpose not just pking in a different location or npcs placed at every possible interval. I'm thinking to make a server that is more of a single player game, for offline play but it could be played online with other people. A game that has an actual story, and with a story comes a purpose its a great thing. Im thinking something like grand theft auto where you play through the story but you have that sandbox element. I'm not sure whether I will do this I'm just seeing if there is anyone interested in this sort of thing and whether or not they would want to help if i [i]did[/i] decide to do it. As is most likely I wouldn't do much writing of code, A-levels and other things prevent this. But I would be an active part of the project as much as my time allows. Anyone interested in this

item.title: Possible Project
item.dc:creator: @Maxxxx Maxxxx
item.description:
@Maxxxx wrote:

I like your concept, Count me in pl0x.

Read full topic

item.title: Possible Project
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“xEnt, post:12, topic:272325”]Personally i think nothing is going to happen with this.

Reason this community goes nowhere is because lack of intelligent developers. The ones who can improve RS2 development are the ones who don’t give a shit, or don’t want too.[/quote]
hence why im giving it a go, normally i know projects on this site go down the shitter and all servers are generic,bland and boring. The main reason is a lack of creativity and individuality so im going to try and add a proper story to this where players can feel like they are playing an almost different game in single player or with other users on a server it wont matter but the point will be to give users something to do instead of playing the same shit with a different name

Read full topic

item.title: Possible Project
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

that is something everyone will have to decide once we have enough interest, i personally have no preference
EDIT: theres a developer section setup on my site now so if you want to discuss ideas and show your support feel free to put it in there, alert me once you’ve registered so i can grant you access though

Read full topic

Most likely 317, as they are easier to make models for and to develop.

item.title: Possible Project
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

well thats one as long as we can get more people into the crafting of a good in depth single player story this project will work, suggestions are welcome from anyone story, period etc anything like that could help push our project forward so dont keep the ideas to yourself

Read full topic

item.title: Possible Project
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

i saw that and was going to mention it but i forgot the name GTA was an example because its open world yet has a distinct story line the theme is open to be anything. yes a graphic/client designer would be needed, probably need as many different items within a client as you could possibly fit, a new UI.
Well a few people have expressed interest in this and it could shape up to be a nice project so i’m going to setup a way of group communications anyone who’s interested in this pop your name down and i’ll set it up and message all the interested members

Read full topic

item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Making “single player” server is a great idea. If your thinking on a GTA theme, Supra S has created Crezzur however it is designed to be multiplayer.
